mapper.select: select pc.name,pc.opening_cost,g.id as goodId,g.second_title, g.retail_price as price,g.title,g.Model_number,b.name as good_brands from goods g LEFT JOIN goods_pay_channels gpc on gpc.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc on pc.id=gpc.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id where g.id=#{goodId} and pc.id=#{paychannelId}

select pc.name,pc.opening_cost,g.id as goodId,g.second_title,g.lease_price,g.lease_time,g.return_time, g.lease_deposit as price,g.title,g.Model_number,b.name as good_brands,g.lease_description from goods g LEFT JOIN goods_pay_channels gpc on gpc.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc on pc.id=gpc.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id where g.id=#{goodId} and pc.id=#{paychannelId} and g.has_lease>0

SELECT o.order_number,o.total_price,ca.receiver,ca.address,IFNULL(op.pay_type,0) paytype from orders o LEFT JOIN customer_addresses ca on ca.id=o.customer_address_id LEFT JOIN order_payments op on op.order_id=o.id where o.id=#{id}
SELECT g.title,pc.name as pcname,og.quantity from order_goods og LEFT JOIN goods g on og.good_id=g.id left JOIN pay_channels pc on pc.id=og.pay_channel_id where order_id=#{id}
